A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is probably the best Star Wars film since Empire and Ep.4. I say this because The Disney version of what we all Love has become solidified in telling its own story in its own way\, and it works. Other fans will bash this because it is so different and they Will not understand the risk this film took in its story telling. If we all got what we expected this film to be what good would it do as far as making it special. I enjoyed the last Jedi because of its dark yet friendly tone. R.i.p Carrie Fisher!
